# Arbital

> Arbital is an automated delta-neutral market-making platform for perpetual DEXs. Users create and manage autonomous trading bots that farm points and rewards across multiple decentralized exchanges while maintaining market-neutral exposure. Non-custodial — your keys, your funds.

Docs: https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs
Website: https://arbital.xyz
GitHub: https://github.com/VOT-Labs

## Overview

- [Introduction](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs): Platform overview, choose your path (beginner, trader, developer), and quick links
- [How It Works](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/overview/how-it-works): Core loop, TWAP vs Grid strategies, position bias, bot lifecycle, architecture diagram, non-custodial model, execution modes, and incentive opportunities
- [Key Concepts](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/overview/key-concepts): Delta-neutral, perpetual futures, funding rates, market making, spread, rebalancing, slippage, collateral

## Getting Started

- [Quick Start](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/quick-start): Get your first bot running — prerequisites, access, wallet connection, bot creation, monitoring
- [Connect Wallet](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/connect-wallet): Wallet-based auth flow, supported wallets (EVM + Solana), EIP-712 signing, session management, credential binding
- [Create Your First Bot](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/create-first-bot): Step-by-step bot creation wizard — strategy, exchange, asset, mode, budget, inventory, deploy
- [MetaMask Setup](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/wallets/metamask): MetaMask installation, connection, credential binding for Extended/Hyperliquid
- [Phantom Setup](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/wallets/phantom): Phantom installation, connection, Pacifica agent binding for Solana
- [Ledger Hardware Wallet](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/getting-started/wallets/ledger): Hardware wallet setup for both EVM and Solana, blind signing, security best practices

## Exchanges

- [Supported Exchanges](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/exchanges/overview): Exchange comparison, fee structure (2 bps Arbital fee), credential binding, available markets, points farming
- [Pacifica](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/exchanges/pacifica): Solana perp DEX — setup guide, referral approval, agent binding, markets, fees (0.035-0.045%)
- [Extended / Hyperliquid](https://arbital-1.gitbook.io/docs/exchanges/extended): EVM perp DEX — setup guide, credential binding, markets, fees (0.03-0.04%)
